feature-quotes-list.quotes-subtitle: This is your quotes page. View all of your quotes below.

feature-quote-details.quote-subtitle-if-approved: Your quote approval has been sent to
feature-quote-details.quote-subtitle-if-not-approved: This quote has been created specifically for you. From this site you can request changes to this quote, as well as add additional files and a message to
feature-quote-details.request-change-info: Common change requests include artwork size, artwork positioning, product quantities, and product variants. Please summarize the changes you'd like to see in an updated quote.
feature-quote-details.request-change-additional-info: Change To In-Hands Date or shipping location could impact pricing and estimated delivery dates.

request-changes-dialog.title: Request Changes
request-changes-dialog.image-disclaimer: *Example image may not represent the exact configuration selected.
